name: Tea Fight
description:
NOTE: THIS GAME IS ONLY PLAYABLE WITH 2 PLAYERS!! A Game Made for Trijam #156 The 3 hour long game jam.

Want a boxing game but instead of people its tea? Then this game is for you!

Player 1 Controls - W to punch, Space to block.

Player 2 Controls - Shift to punch, P to block.

Press space to start the fight! >:)
